entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-agent
entries.intent: Create and manage Microsoft Agent Framework multi-agent systems (AutoGen, Semantic Kernel)

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-compose
entries.intent: Generate Docker Compose files for services with resource allocation and dependencies

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-config
entries.intent: Generate service configuration with Vault secret integration

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-deploy
entries.intent: Deploy ACC services by phase with dependency checks and health validation

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-ha
entries.intent: Control Home Assistant entities, automations, and voice assistant integration

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-init
entries.intent: Initialize the Ahling Command Center project structure with 70+ services configuration

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-knowledge
entries.intent: Query and update the knowledge graph (Neo4j) with vector search (Qdrant) integration

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-logs
entries.intent: View and filter service logs with advanced search and tail capabilities

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-ollama
entries.intent: Manage Ollama models, GPU allocation, and model serving with RX 7900 XTX optimization

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-orchestrate
entries.intent: Run multi-agent workflows combining Ollama, AutoGen, Home Assistant, and knowledge systems

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-repo
entries.intent: Scaffold a new service repository with Docker, configs, and CI/CD templates

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-resource
entries.intent: Check and optimize resource allocation across ACC infrastructure (CPU, RAM, GPU, VRAM)

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-status
entries.intent: Check infrastructure health and service status across all ACC phases

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-vault
entries.intent: Manage HashiCorp Vault secrets - set, get, list, rotate, and backup

entries.name: ahling-command-center:acc-voice
entries.intent: Test and configure the voice pipeline (Whisper STT, Piper TTS, Wyoming protocol)
